description:
The Karasuma Girls help out at the Honosaka Clinic where they see a surprisingly hard-working side of Sonia. But it turns out Sonia also has plans for Kana at their school`s upcoming culture festival...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Become My Servant - Russian Food and Sweet Dream
Watashi no Geboku ni Onarinasai - Russia Ryouri de Ii Yume o
Werdet meine Dienstboten! Russisches Essen und gute Träume!
私の下僕におなりなさい・ロシア料理でいい夢を
